details.description:
Tim Perry is a software developer currently working for Softwire, a bespoke software development company based in North London, working on a wide variety of projects at all scales. He also acts as Softwire's open-source champion, helping Softwire to engage with and give back to the wider software development community.

In his spare time he's a prolific open-source contributor, involved with projects like JUnit, Ektorp and Grunt in addition to his own. He's also keen on giving lightning talks on various technical topics and a big fan (and occasional winner) of hackathons.

@pimterry
